body:
i not like NTR. But as long as it's just the son and the mother. it is acceptable

Mother needs to be treated with love and respect. Especially those who have sex with you.
Fuck, so far so good, although... Knowing this guy he will get some NTR scheme guy at the very last chapters to fuck up the story. Sigh.
Well this time the son is the only one fucking her . . . I tope . . .
